column4: Morning all, I'd like to get my sound working but I can't figure out which driver I need and how to load the driver, anyone availible to help?
run "lspci -v" and look for the audio entry
0000:00:1e.2 Multimedia audio controller: Intel Corporation 82801FB/FBM/FR/FW/FRW (ICH6 Family) AC'97 Audio Controller (rev 04)
and what is the problem with sound? you cant hear anything?
could you paste the output of "amixer" somewhere?
sure, I'll pastebin it, one sec.
hmm not sure, is the intel snd module loaded in "lsmod | grep snd"
sorry I cant see what the problem could be :-/
try asking crimsun when he is around and not busy, he knows all regarding sound
sure thing, thanks for the reference.
np, sorry I could actually help :)
